}} 'Progesterone' also known as 'P4' ('p'regn-'4'-ene-3,20-dione) is a C-21
steroid hormone involved in the female menstrual cycle, pregnancy (supports
[[gestation]]) and embryogenesis of humans and other species. 
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones called progestogens, and is the
major naturally occurring human progestogen.
